item.title: NOVAGOLD RESOURCES INC 10-K
item.description: NOVAGOLD RESOURCES INC, which is in the Gold & Silver Ores [1040] industry, SEC 10-K filing on January 25, 2023 had 29356 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: gold - 451 instances donlin - 321 instances company - 273 instances project - 237 instances mineral - 231 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
